Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Irving Park
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Irving Park, Sheridan, & Broadway, due to street blockage near Broadway/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Irving Park, Sheridan, then resume their normal route on Broadway, due to street blockage near Broadway/Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.
